column2: We have travelled to San Francisco many times and we have visited various restaurants and cafe's until we discovered Cafe Le on this trip.  We loved it so much that we were there every day for breakfast.  Simple food; delicious sandwiches, humble and friendly staff. If you are looking for a simple no-frills cafe with mouth-watering sandwiches, Cafe Le is the place.  Just amazing!  I would rate it 10⭐️

Best mom and pop breakfast place of our San Francisco vacation. Humble but delicious breakfast sandwiches. A pretty good menu and coffee options for such a small place. No frills, but everything you could want for breakfast.
Extra fresh sandwich, nice hot chocolate and nice ladies. Be careful if you plan to sit as they only have 5 tables. Most people take their breakfast on the go.  Had the turkey cranberry sandwich.

The people who run it are nice and local people seem to have a very positive relationship with the place. I had coffee which was not so great, and to be fair we only visited because we needed to use the bathroom. It wasn't that inviting otherwise.
The best place for breakfast you can choose in San Francisco. Amazing ladies, great sandwiches and breakfast #6 top of the top:)

Great place for a simple but good breakfast. The ladies at the store are very friendly. If I would life there, I would get daily my coffee from there. They work as a great senior team with a nice and a true smile at their face.
Such a great local shop! Very sweet shop owners and great food:)
Cozy place with good sandwiches. Good breakfast choice for a rainy morning
Small place, but really good food and nice staff

Good breakfast, service and prices. The croissant sandwich is very good. The ladies that own the Cafe are very nice. I recommend this place (at least for breakfast). They don't open on Saturday and Sunday.
Got the #7 and really enjoyed the sandwich. The coffee was really good too. Make sure to stop in if you want a quick bite to eat and to start your day off right.

Awesome breakfast sandwich! The owner gets a little worked up if you leave without paying, but he seemed understanding that I forgot. Seriously, the breakfast sandwich is so good. They have lots of other sandwiches, too. And they have tons of delicious bread, all very fresh.

Stopped into Cafe Le for breakfast this morning, and I'm glad we did. Friendly, cheerful staff within a compact and bijou cafe. Breakfasts are nicely cooked. We had a sesame bagel with egg and sausage, and toast also with egg and sausage. Fresh orange juice and coffee sorted us out nicely. The menu suggested they also do nice sandwiches and a few cooked meals for lunches. Would go back.
Great cafe with great breakfast! Yummy Yummy
Had a Pastrami Sandwich right before they closed for the day. Still has been served with a smile and was delicious as a small lunch.
Affordable and delicious breakfast. Update, stop by 4 years ago and had breakfast and returned this time for breakfast. Very affordable for San Francisco prices
A small but nice Café to sit in for a delicious breakfast. Very friendly staff.
Great mom and pop cafe for breakfast and lunch. Cash only. Good selection of classic American breakfast food with a twist of Asian influence in their lunch specials(instant ramen bowls included)
Great place and good prices with a gentle management. It's small but very friendly.
Eggs bacon and pancakes. 👍 On the 49 /28 routes.
Very cozy breakfast. A very good alternative of breakfast out of the big franchises.
A great place for a quick and inexpensive breakfast. Food was good and service really friendly. Would definitely go there again
Open before wake up time, cheap like the budgie, good value 4 ur money.
good chicken rice bowls for lunch,  look out for local school kid rush at lunch. ok breakfast. fair priced and nice friendly service
Great pancakes nice and fluffy eggs flipped just fine coffee is great 👌 I would go back next time I'm in town …
Pretty good bagel and coffee. Not to expensive. Very convenient, right on the bus stop. Open early
Best strawberry smoothie 🥤🍓 Very nice lady that works there …
Superb chicken curry and veggies with white rice.I have had it over 100 times and counting here.
Spicy tofu rice is delicious. Been craving it the whole week.
They're not open when you want them to be open!  Uhg!  I had to edit their hours of operation..  uhg!
Small hole in the wall with good, cheap, regular people food. Recommended
Cozy little corner cafe, delicious food, and friendly staff ^_^
i love the thai ice rea here and the food its very delicious
Good place for coffee and breakfast.
Best breakfast in town.
Good for a cheap quick breakfast
The taste is well.
Great breakfast

I started my morning near Fort Mason looking for breakfast and finding a coffee shop open early, only to see a VERY long line. I Googled around for nearby options and found this wonderful little café!  Super small space, just one sweet lady seemingly in charge of the whole process, making every order fresh. Very affordable, a bit of a secret it seems given that it wasn't busy. Absolutely DELICOUSL breakfast sandwich, you can't beat a fresh made sandwich made with love like that.

If you have the opportunity to enjoy Cafe *Le* 10_15 USD, you will have breakfast for a delicious dish and you will enjoy a cup of coffee with a wonderful aroma, and many more dishes of real food. *Cafe Le* menu with your family's choice!!

My experience in this place was very good. We had had breakfast in various places for several days but we loved this place since the breakfasts are very similar to those we have in Puerto Rico. They have a variety of breads, hams and combinations. We all liked the coffee. The ham was different but it was very good. Breakfast was served quickly and everything was very good. We had breakfast in this place the 3 days we were in San Francisco. In short, a place with good breakfasts and excellent service. I recommend it.
We were in San Francisco for 6 days and we went every day for breakfast. Friendly staff, very good Chai Latte and coffee, variety of food: hot and cold sandwiches, bagels, croissants, etc…
Small family restaurant ideal for breakfast, friendly welcome and good value for money. I recommend to start a good day of visit...
A small, inexpensive highlight in otherwise expensive San Francisco  Very good breakfast with very friendly Asians
During our trip to San Francisco we had breakfast there several times. highly recommended Excellent atention
Good and cheap breakfast in quick and fresh preparation.
Absolute insider tip for everyone who is simply looking for a delicious breakfast with a friendly hostess at fair prices!
Excellent breakfast pleasant and welcoming environment nothing to say
Very nice people, the food is delicious. Highly recommended!
Great breakfast at good prices. service very good. I can only recommend 😊
Good and cheap place (according to San Francisco prices) to have a typical American breakfast.
Very good value for money! Nice staff and you sit at a bus stop, there is always something to see there.
